projects.description: Since October 2018, I have been working as the in house web developer at South Moon Under in Annapolis, MD. As the web developer, I am a member of an Ecom/Marketing team that includes very talented designers, SEO Specialists, and digital strategists who work to make the site what it is. about_me.text: Hey there! My name is Jesse Shaw. I am a Full Stack Developer currently working on a Learning Management System application at Jacob's Engineering. I enjoy coding because I love to create things. I enjoy building things from scratch and seeing them come to life. I am always interested in meeting and learning from fellow developers and creatives who have similar mindsets. I love working with people who are not afraid to challenge each other and make the world a better place.
